title: "Dear jungle Morgana"
body:
"May I have blue please".

Lol f*ck off Vayne.

replies.body:
Yeah lol? Haven't played it in a while.

So much damage and those huge snares, big Ulti 2. Bit less useful than it could be though.

She has one of the highest base damage gains in the game aye, not exceptionally high but good for her range.

She wants it though.

That 0.8 second reduced timer on Q and obvious heavy mana dependency.

Swear if at any point during the game if I lost a blue we woulda lost.
usually after 2 buffs the jungler doesn't 100% need it anymore.. it can be given up to the a mid/top or support if you wish..

Built a Hextech Revolver after Magus Trailblazer because we had a few AP and it gives you nice sustain, once I made the Will of the Ancients had 52% Spell vamp, heal for like 300 off a snare and because that was my build, with a Deathcap I had huge mana problems as her Tormented Soil or whatever is rather costly and she needs to use her Q and Tormented Soil to farm which is again rather costly - and used a few shields here and there during counter jungling and on team mates.
